sqlMap.select: select a.mus_title, a.mus_lyrics, b.alb_image, c.sing_name from music a, album b, singer c where a.alb_no = b.alb_no and b.sing_no = c.sing_no and a.mus_no = #mus_no#
select mus_no, mem_id from playlist where mem_id = #mem_id#
sqlMap.update: insert into playlist (play_no, play_indate, mus_no, mem_id) values (seq_play_no.nextval, sysdate, #mus_no#, #mem_id#)
sqlMap.delete: delete from playlist where mem_id = #mem_id# and mus_no = #mus_no#
